title: One Piece: Pirate Warriors 4 Heads to Wano in TGS Trailer
subTitle: See more of new character Carrot and the Wano arc ahead of 2020 launch
description: If you were worried for some reason that One Piece: Pirate Warriors 4 would only focus on Whole Cake Island, Bandai Namco's new preview is here to scatter those concerns like so many cherry blossom petals. That's right, Wano Country is front and center in the latest trailer! Read on for more.
